Package game.actors.npcs

Class SuspiciousMerchant

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.npcs.NPC
game.actors.npcs.SuspiciousMerchant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Merchant, Scammer, TimeAware
public class SuspiciousMerchant extends NPC implements TimeAware, Merchant, Scammer
A suspicious merchant NPC that can sell items with a chance of scamming buyers.

The merchant wanders around, sells items with health effects, reacts to time phases by becoming unconscious during the day, and may run away when it scams a target.

Author:
Adji Ilhamhafiz Sarie Hakim

  • Constructor Details

    • SuspiciousMerchant

      public SuspiciousMerchant(NPCController controller)
      Constructs a SuspiciousMerchant with the given NPCController. Initializes wandering behaviour and a randomized set of items to sell.
      Parameters:
      controller - the NPCController managing this merchant's behaviour

    • onTimeChange

      public void onTimeChange(Location location)
      Reacts to time phase changes. Becomes unconscious during the day if conscious.
      Specified by:
      onTimeChange in interface TimeAware
      Parameters:
      location - current location of the merchant

    • getSellActions

      public ActionList getSellActions()
